data.text: @MatchboxCine @filmhubscotland @cinesidecard @FilmHubWales @ICOtweets @InclusiveCinema @FAN_BiggerPict @BFI @CreativeScots This is really cool - nice one! Would love to see if we can figure out an integration? Maybe film records in Eventive Virtual can automatically look up accessibility assets - would certainly save on admin for organisers and help spread accessible screenings.

@MatchboxCine @filmhubscotland @cinesidecard @FilmHubWales @ICOtweets @InclusiveCinema @FAN_BiggerPict @BFI @CreativeScots This is amazing and just what we need. (hope you're OK and the Covid is mild). Xxx
@MatchboxCine @cinesidecard @InclusiveCinema @filmhubscotland @ICOtweets This is brilliant. You guys really are the best. (And hope you get better and are out in the world again soon.)

Sidecard (@cinesidecard) is a collaboration of Matchbox Cine with Inclusive Cinema (@InclusiveCinema), Film Hub Scotland (@filmhubscotland) and the Independent Cinema Office (@ICOtweets) #access #cinema
It's not quite ready for beta launch just yet (very soon!), but you can sign up for updates at the website: https://t.co/3TtqG8Yo2P https://t.co/emtG2fAOtZ

Supplementing the resource will be a range of FAQs, glossaries and guides to working with Sidecard and with access materials more generally. Separate guides will be tailored to whichever you are - distributor, exhibitor, film-maker, audience member.
